title: BPSSC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 1799 Sub Inspector Posts
description: Bihar Police Subordinate Service Commission (BPSSC) has declared the latest job notification fr 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 1799 Police Sub Inspector Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in Any Degree can grab this chance and apply for the BPSSC Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
